alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Hamilton and Merrick Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Central City to near Marquette to near St. Libory. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chapman around 525 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Marquette and Hordville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
